attributes.action: NHS staff to be screened for COVID-19 and provide the staff with PPE
attributes.additional_details: The consideration after the instruction from the government will be highly considerable.
attributes.background: The government should encourage the screening of all the NHS staff to ensure the safety of their life and their families. All the frontline workers are working extremely hard in this situation and hence, the support towards them and their family should be demonstrated.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
